definition: role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Topical administration of antifungal agents is main method in the treatment of fungal keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 药物治疗真菌性角膜炎的主要方法是滴用抗真菌眼剂。

sentences.english: Aim To observe the therapeutic efficacy of Matrine on viral keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察苦参碱对病毒性角膜炎的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To build a rat fungal keratitis model of Aspergillus Fumigutus.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立大鼠烟曲霉菌性角膜炎的动物模型。

sentences.english: Objective Summerize and discuss the cause and therapeutics of paralytic keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结并探讨麻痹性角膜炎的成因及治疗。

sentences.english: How to treat on irritability keratitis?
sentences.chinese: 过敏性角膜炎上怎么治疗？

sentences.english: Is the patient that there is keratitis OK does the operation treat myopia?
sentences.chinese: 有角膜炎的患者可以手术治疗近视吗？

sentences.english: The rabbit model of Acanthamoeba keratitis was successfully established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了家兔棘阿米巴角膜炎动物模型。

sentences.english: There were exposure keratopathy and pallor disc in the left eye.
sentences.chinese: 左眼有暴露性角膜炎及视神经苍白。

sentences.english: The curative time was significantly shortend compared to that in the control group.
sentences.chinese: 绿脓杆菌角膜炎组中对照组疗效优于治疗组。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the combined therapy and effect of mycotic keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析真菌性角膜炎的综合治疗方法和效果。

sentences.english: Herpes simplex keratitis is common in department of ophthalmology.
sentences.chinese: 单纯疱疹性角膜炎是眼科常见病，多发病。

sentences.english: Cogan's syndrome consists of an interstitial keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 柯根化综合症包括间质性角膜炎。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of therapeutic keratoplasty in treatment of infectious keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价感染性角膜炎角膜移植治疗的临床效果。

sentences.english: Blurred vision, eye irritation, punctate keratitis, conjunctival hyperemia.
sentences.chinese: 视力模糊，眼睛刺痛，点状角膜炎，结膜充血。

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
